Articles.Content:
I am trying to build an [kRPC](http://djungelorm.github.io/krpc/docs/index.html) implementation in an [iron python](http://ironpython.net/) WPF app - but I have no idea how to implement the kRPC python client in iron python. Is there someone here more familiar than me with python and installing modules that could point me in the right direction?

Thank you!
